section.name: Applications
section.p: The source distribution includes to demonstrate most of the functionalities of the toolkit:

ul.li: Taglib and reverse proxy: webassembletool-master and webassembletool-provider applications
Aggregator: webassembletool-aggregator, webassembletool-aggregated1 and webassembletool-aggregated2 applications
Aggregator with CAS SSO: webassembletool-cas, webassembletool-casified-aggregator, webassembletool-casified-aggregated1 and webassembletool-casified-aggregated2 applications

section.name: Building
section.p: To build the applications, use clean and build Ant tasks
Built webapps are located under bin/webapps folder and can be deployed on a servlet container
